name: Constraint\_Surfaces\_and\_Omega\_Manifold
intent: Construct the manifold of admissible global states on which Ω acts.

axiom\_box.name: Omega\_Manifold\_Axiom
axiom\_box.intent: Define the topological and geometric structure of constraint surfaces.
constraints: MΩ is smooth, connected, and globally bounded
Every state under Ω lies on a constraint surface SΩ ⊂ MΩ

notes: Defines the global stage on which Ω acts.
